name: PebbleDash Alpha
description:
Welcome To PebbleDash!

this is a multiplayer fun party platformer game (try saying that 10 times lol) that is in alpha at the moment.

This game was originally known as "60s To Die" which was a jam submission to the wowie jam 3.0 & the brackeys gamejam.

IMPORTANT : the game has triple jump & gliding, please do not forget that-

controls :

G To Glide (not added yet)

Left & Right arrow keys to move... well left & right.

space bar to jump.

Left shift to dash!

PS : https://discord.gg/EPDAnXQwrx ;))
